!!! error TS5108: Option 'alwaysStrict=false' has been removed. Please remove it from your configuration.
==== a.js (4 errors) ====
    function foo(a, b) {
        switch (a) {
            case 10:
            ~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS7029: Fallthrough case in switch.
                if (b) {
                    return b;
                }
            case 20:
                return a;
        }
    }
    
    function bar() {
        return x;
        function bar2() {
        }
        var x = 10; // error
        ~~~~~~~~~~~
